mapper.update: update role set rolename = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_key = #{publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, private_key = #{privateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_public = #{signPublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_private = #{signPrivate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, rolename, public_key, private_key, sign_public, sign_private from role
